2: gang dbang po'i las nyid pas//gang gang de de'i rang bzhin du//rang gi mnyam <mistake>bzhag</mistake> med <mistake>spyor</mistake> bas//rang gis rig pa'i <mistake>lra</mistake> 'dren no//de nyid sbyor ba de yis ni//thams cad kho na 'grub pa'o//
3: sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni//rtag tu mthong na rab tu 'grub//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas <mistake>klog /de</mistake> ni nyes pa <mistake>rnamsgrol</mistake> te//dngos grub <mistake>thal/</mistake>
4: cad dbang phyug <mistake>'gyur //sangs</mistake> <mistake>rgas</mistake> thams cad dang mnyam par <mistake>sbyar</mistake> ba mkha' <mistake>'grom</mistake> sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi <mistake>shurtsa</mistake> gnyis pa'o////
5: de ltar sna tshogs rjes su chags pa'o//dga' ba pad+ma rnam dag che ba <mistake>yis//bsal</mistake> bar <mistake>rjs</mistake> su gtsang <mistake>bdm</mistake> pa rtag par sbyin pa yis//dam pa bde ba'i dngos <mistake>pas</mistake> dam tshig bdag la bde <mistake>g</mistake>
6: rjes su <mistake>bsgrub//dama</mistake> pa'i dga' ba shin tu <mistake>sbyar</mistake> ba skal bzang <mistake>dama</mistake> <mistake>pa shin</mistake> tu dga'//rang bzhin <mistake>gi</mistake> ni rang bzhin dag <mistake>partag</mistake> tu rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin dngos//dam pa dga' ba
7: la sogs sbyor ba'i skal bzang <mistake>dma</mistake> <mistake>pa shan</mistake> tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin 'grub pa'o//dag pa rjes su <mistake>'grab</mistake> pa'i rang bzhin kho na so so rjes su grub pa bde ba las <mistake>ndam</mistake> pa'i gsang <mistake>cshan</mistake> rgyud
8: phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di yongs su rdzogs <mistake>so///kbdag</mistake> gi 'di ni dang ba'i snying po <mistake>mchog /bde</mistake> <mistake>kla</mistake> chen po mchog gi mchog 'gyur mthu <mistake>shen</mistake> po//kun mchog <mistake>'byur</mistake> ba'i sems can rtag pa ci yi
